mapper.select: SELECT rec_id AS recId FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping ORDER BY rec_id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT comment_id AS commentId FROM mtmydb.mtmy_comment ORDER BY comment_id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT goods_id AS goodsId, SUM(goods_num) AS buyCount FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping WHERE rec_id > ${recId} GROUP BY goods_id

SELECT b.goods_id AS goodsId, SUM(IFNULL(deliver_rank,0) + IFNULL(goods_rank,0) + IFNULL(service_rank,0)) / (COUNT(1) * 3) AS evaluationScore, count(1) AS evaluationCount, IFNULL((SELECT a.goods_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_goods_statistics a where a.goods_id = b.goods_id),'NULL') AS isExist FROM mtmydb.mtmy_comment b WHERE comment_id > ${commentId} GROUP BY goods_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_goods_statistics ( goods_id, buy_count, evaluation_score, evaluation_count, is_sham, update_date ) VALUES ( #{goodsId}, #{buyCount}, 0, 0, '0', SYSDATE() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE buy_count = buy_count + #{buyCount};
